titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of crops destroyed by casualty.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/21/1997--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the deduction as capital expenditures of the following costs incurred for replanting edible crops for human consumption which were lost by reason of freezing temperatures, disease, drought, pests, or casualty: (1) replanting costs; (2) 80 percent of the special replanting costs of such replanting; (3) the removal of lost plants; and (4) and preproductive costs.
